Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Piercing, Can poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Constrict, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 10 Bludgeoning, Can grapple and restrain a target

Other Actions.Action 1: Change Shape, The Couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Couatl can cast a large number of spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Weapons, The Couatl's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 3: Shielded Mind, The Couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location

Damage Immunities.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
